properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES (SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, DEFAULT)
SELECT BNO, TITLE, CREATE_DATE, WRITER FROM BOARD WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT BNO, TITLE, CREATE_DATE, CONTENT FROM BOARD WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND BNO = ?
